Uses of Class
gametools.Group

  • Packages that use Group 
    Package Description
    gametools
    A lightweight and simple to use library for creating 2D games in Java.
    gametools.gravity
    Package containing additional tools for creating a side scroller styled game with gravity.

    • Uses of Group in gametools

      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Group 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Group.add(Group sprites)
      Adds all the passed in elements to the group.
      java.util.List<Sprite> Group.getAllWithin(Group sprites)
      Returns an array list of all elements from the group that collide with elements from the passed in group.
      java.util.List<Sprite> Group.getAllWithin(Group sprites, Area.Collision method)
      Returns an array list of all elements from the group that collide with elements from the passed in group.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Group sprites)
      Checks if the object is colliding with any of the elements in the group using the default collision method.
      boolean Group.isWithin(Group sprites)
      Checks if any two sprites collide between the two groups.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Group sprites, Area.Collision method)
      Checks if the object is colliding with any of the elements in the group using the default collision method.
      boolean Group.isWithin(Group sprites, Area.Collision method)
      Checks if any two sprites collide between the two groups.
      static boolean Game.mouseWithin(Group sprites)
      Checks if the mouse is inside any of the elements in the group.
      void Group.remove(Group sprites)
      Removes all the sprites from the group that match the ones passed in.
      Constructors in gametools with parameters of type Group 
      Constructor and Description
      Group(Group copy)
      Creates a copy of the specified group.
